name: DISTRAINT
summary: DISTRAINT is a 2D psychological horror adventure game for PC. You step into the shoes of an ambitious young man named Price. In order to forge a partnership from a famous company, Price seizes the property of an elderly woman. In that very moment he finds out the price of his humanity. This is his story and the tale of his regrets...
info:
• 中文名: 扣押
  • 平台: Android
  • 平台: iOS
  • 平台: PC

  • 发行日期: 2015-10-21
